parts.text: {"word":"riordinare","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"整理する、整頓する、片付ける","english_definition":"to tidy up, to put in order, to rearrange","examples":[{"sentence":"Devo riordinare la mia stanza.","translation":"I need to tidy up my room.","english_translation":"I need to tidy up my room."},{"sentence":"Riordina i tuoi libri sullo scaffale.","translation":"Tidy up your books on the shelf.","english_translation":"Tidy up your books on the shelf."},{"sentence":"Ho riordinato tutti i documenti.","translation":"I tidied up all the documents.","english_translation":"I tidied up all the documents."}],"collocations":["riordinare la stanza (to tidy up the room)","riordinare i libri (to tidy up the books)","riordinare i documenti (to tidy up the documents)"],"synonyms":["sistemare","mettere in ordine","accomodare"],"antonyms":["disordinare","scompigliare"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（再び）注文する、発注し直す","english_definition":"to reorder, to order again","examples":[{"sentence":"Dobbiamo riordinare la merce.","translation":"We need to reorder the goods.","english_translation":"We need to reorder the goods."},{"sentence":"Ho riordinato i pezzi di ricambio.","translation":"I reordered the spare parts.","english_translation":"I reordered the spare parts."}],"collocations":["riordinare la merce (to reorder the goods)","riordinare i pezzi di ricambio (to reorder the spare parts)"],"synonyms":["ordinare di nuovo","richiedere"],"antonyms":["cancellare l'ordine"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（再び）並べ替える、配列し直す","english_definition":"to rearrange, to reorder","examples":[{"sentence":"Riordina le sedie nella sala.","translation":"Rearrange the chairs in the room.","english_translation":"Rearrange the chairs in the room."},{"sentence":"Ho riordinato le foto nell'album.","translation":"I rearranged the photos in the album.","english_translation":"I rearranged the photos in the album."}],"collocations":["riordinare le sedie (to rearrange the chairs)","riordinare le foto (to rearrange the photos)"],"synonyms":["riorganizzare","risistemare"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"The word 'riordinare' comes from the prefix 'ri-' (again) and the verb 'ordinare' (to order).","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ri.or.diˈna.re/","syllables":"ri-or-di-na-re"},"inflection":{"conjugation":{"mood":"indicative","tense":{"present":{"io":"riordino","tu":"riordini","lui/lei":"riordina","noi":"riordiniamo","voi":"riordinate","loro":"riordinano"},"past_historic":{"io":"riordinai","tu":"riordinasti","lui/lei":"riordinò","noi":"riordinammo","voi":"riordinaste","loro":"riordinarono"},"imperfect":{"io":"riordinavo","tu":"riordinavi","lui/lei":"riordinava","noi":"riordinavamo","voi":"riordinavate","loro":"riordinavano"},"future":{"io":"riordinerò","tu":"riordinerai","lui/lei":"riordinerà","noi":"riordineremo","voi":"riordinerete","loro":"riordineranno"}},"subjunctive":{"present":{"io":"riordini","tu":"riordini","lui/lei":"riordini","noi":"riordiniamo","voi":"riordiniate","loro":"riordinino"},"imperfect":{"io":"riordinassi","tu":"riordinassi","lui/lei":"riordinasse","noi":"riordinassimo","voi":"riordinaste","loro":"riordinassero"}},"conditional":{"present":{"io":"riordinerei","tu":"riordineresti","lui/lei":"riordinerebbe","noi":"riordineremmo","voi":"riordinereste","loro":"riordinerebbero"}},"imperative":{"present":{"tu":"riordina","noi":"riordiniamo","voi":"riordinate"}}}},"gerund":"riordinando","past_participle":"riordinato"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Riordinare' is a versatile verb that encompasses various actions related to putting things in order. It can refer to tidying up a space, reordering items, or rearranging things. The specific meaning is usually clear from the context.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Io riordino a la stanza.","correct":"Io riordino la stanza.","note":"The correct preposition to use is the direct object without a preposition."},{"incorrect":"Riordinare è buono per la mente.","correct":"Riordinare fa bene alla mente.","note":"While 'riordinare è buono' is grammatically correct, 'riordinare fa bene' (tidying up is good for) is a more common and natural expression."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["riordinamento (reorganization)","riordinatore (organizer)"],"related_verbs":["ordinare (to order)","disordinare (to disarrange)"],"related_nouns":["ordine (order)","riordino (reordering)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"frequency_corpus":"Medium frequency","frequency_other":"Common verb","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"The verb 'riordinare' is used to describe the action of putting things in order, tidying up, or rearranging. It's a common verb in everyday conversations, especially when talking about household chores or organizing items. The meaning is generally straightforward, but context is important to understand whether it refers to tidying, reordering, or rearranging."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Dopo la festa, dobbiamo riordinare tutto.","translation":"After the party, we need to tidy everything up.","type":"general","meaning_category":"Tidying up"},{"sentence":"Ho dovuto riordinare i file sul computer.","translation":"I had to rearrange the files on the computer.","type":"specific","meaning_category":"Rearranging"},{"sentence":"Il negozio deve riordinare la merce esaurita.","translation":"The store needs to reorder the sold-out merchandise.","type":"business","meaning_category":"Reordering"}]}
